description.value:
While wearing this ring in dim light or darkness, you can cast dancing lights and light from the ring at will. Casting either spell from the ring requires an action.

The ring has 6 charges for the following other properties. The ring regains 1d6 expended charges daily at dawn.

Faerie &Reference[fire]{Fire}. You can expend 1 charge as an action to cast faerie &Reference[fire]{fire} from the ring.

Ball &Reference[lightning]{Lightning}. You can expend 2 charges as an action to create one to four 3-foot-diameter spheres of &Reference[lightning]{lightning}. The more spheres you create, the less powerful each &Reference[sphere]{sphere} is individually.

Each &Reference[sphere]{sphere} appears in an unoccupied space you can see within 120 feet of you. The spheres last as long as you concentrate (as if concentrating on a spell), up to 1 minute. Each &Reference[sphere]{sphere} sheds dim light in a 30-foot radius.

As a bonus action, you can move each &Reference[sphere]{sphere} up to 30 feet, but no farther than 120 feet away from you. When a creature other than you comes within 5 feet of a &Reference[sphere]{sphere}, the &Reference[sphere]{sphere} discharges &Reference[lightning]{lightning} at that creature and disappears. That creature must make a [[/save dex 15 format=long]]. On a failed save, the creature takes &Reference[lightning]{lightning} damage based on the number of spheres you created.

Spheres &Reference[lightning]{Lightning} Damage
4 2d4
3 2d6
2 5d4
1 4d12

 

Shooting Stars. You can expend 1 to 3 charges as an action. For every charge you expend, you launch a glowing mote of light from the ring at a point you can see within 60 feet of you. Each creature within a 15-foot &Reference[cube]{cube} originating from that point is showered in sparks and must make a [[/save dex 15 format=long]], taking 5d4 &Reference[fire]{fire} damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
